About Us

FinEdge is a digital financial technology platform. It is designed to make Cross-Border Financial Transactions super fast and easy. The platform provides services like payments, checkout, funds collection, fund disbursements, and more. It was founded in 2020 and is based in Bangalore, India.

FinEdge has leveraged technology to introduce low-cost solutions for international payments for individuals, small businesses and corporates. We have revolutionised the cross-border payments ecosystem through enhanced customer service, extensive global reach, flexible payment options, lower fees, and reduced transaction times. We facilitate international transfers in a secure, fast and affordable way. Each cross-border transaction consists of a set of two individual domestic transactions. Settlement between accounts/offices is done several times a month to optimise exchange rates. The transfer fees range from 0.25â€“3% of the transaction amount and depend on the destination.

#1 Digital Payment Platform for International Transactions

As the economy becomes more interconnected across borders, there is a growing appetite for fast, efficient and accessible payments to be made in every part of the world. FinEdge is a platform that enables you to do all of it, and more!
